title: Czech Republic: Citibank Starts Strategic Partnership with AXA
summary: Prague - Citibank Czech Republic and AXA Group have entered into a co-operation agreement. Their strategic partnership helps to combine their extensive professional experience in the insurance and banking sectors and bring new interesting products and services for both companies' clients.
tag-1: Czech Republic: Citibank Starts Strategic Partnership with AXA
tag-2: Prague – Citibank Czech Republic and AXA Group have entered into a co-operation agreement. Their strategic partnership helps to combine their extensive professional experience in the insurance and banking sectors and bring new interesting products and services for both companies' clients.
tag-3: "Thanks to our partnership, we will be able to leverage the long-standing professional experience of the two companies that in their respective fields, AXA in insurance and Citibank in banking, are leaders in the global market," said Michal Nebeský, Citi Country Officer, Czech Republic.
tag-4: Working with each other, AXA and Citibank will develop new products tailored for both companies' clients and offer them a number of benefits. Through their co-operation, the two companies will be able to extend their opportunities in distribution, a product-focused approach, and the range of the tools they use. The first of their joint projects, distribution of AXA Life Insurance products through Citibank's branches, will be launched in June 2013. Other projects in the pipeline include risk insurance, cobranded credit card distribution and Citi payment cards insurance.
tag-5: "Starting this partnership is an advantageous approach both for the clients, for whom it will open access to new products, and in terms of the benefits for the two companies," says Martin Vogl, Chief Executive Officer of the AXA financial group for the Czech Republic and Slovakia.
tag-6: Details about the forthcoming innovations will be published as they are available.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-8: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
